title: Remix NPM INSTRALL  ERROR
body:
```
 remix-project % sudo npm install
npm ERR! code ERESOLVE
npm ERR! ERESOLVE unable to resolve dependency tree
npm ERR! 
npm ERR! While resolving: remix-project@0.19.0-dev
npm ERR! Found: @babel/core@7.15.5
npm ERR! node_modules/@babel/core
npm ERR!   dev @babel/core@"^7.4.5" from the root project
npm ERR! 
npm ERR! Could not resolve dependency:
npm ERR! peer @babel/core@">=7.0.0-beta.50 <7.0.0-rc.0" from @babel/preset-es2015@7.0.0-beta.53
npm ERR! node_modules/@babel/preset-es2015
npm ERR!   dev @babel/preset-es2015@"^7.0.0-beta.53" from the root project
npm ERR! 
npm ERR! Fix the upstream dependency conflict, or retry
npm ERR! this command with --force, or --legacy-peer-deps
npm ERR! to accept an incorrect (and potentially broken) dependency resolution.
npm ERR! 
npm ERR! See /Users/yuriy/.npm/eresolve-report.txt for a full report.

npm ERR! A complete log of this run can be found in:
npm ERR!     /Users/yuriy/.npm/_logs/2021-09-27T07_16_27_091Z-debug.log
yuriy@YuriydeMacBook-Pro remix-project % npm update babel                                     
npm ERR! code ERESOLVE
npm ERR! code EACCES
npm ERR! syscall open
npm ERR! path /Users/yuriy/.npm/eresolve-report.txt
npm ERR! errno -13
npm ERR! 
npm ERR! Your cache folder contains root-owned files, due to a bug in
npm ERR! previous versions of npm which has since been addressed.
npm ERR! 
npm ERR! To permanently fix this problem, please run:
npm ERR!   sudo chown -R 501:20 "/Users/yuriy/.npm"

npm ERR! A complete log of this run can be found in:
npm ERR!     /Users/yuriy/.npm/_logs/2021-09-27T08_06_46_725Z-debug.log
```
